title: Will Not SURRENDER
body_text:
TRONOLONE against Last-Minute Substitute E. FITZPATRICK!
Tronolone's Captains Career in Jeopardy!
In the absence of originally scheduled participant Derek Carty, one brave upstart agreed to take his place ...
The most losing, unlucky team general of all-time put his generalship on the line against the youngest, brightest star of the modern era - and both were eager to take advantage of the opportunity presented to them.
Flash Results by Game
Tronolone: 1, 2, 3
Fitzpatrick: 4, 5
Those in attendance for this 149th surely went home with a glowing smile, and not because the cocky Tronolone kept his captains career out of the grave. A plethora of memorable, laughable moments coupled with pavement-diving catches and wicked dodging displays allowed all 23 participants to thoroughly enjoy the three hours given on this Saturday night. Plus, the enthusiasm and heart of the sport's now-youngest leading captain couldn't disappoint.
On the doorstep of the summer thriller, DODGEBALL 150, self-proclaimed "Creation"
John Tronolone
narrowly defeated youthful sensation
Eamon Fitzpatrick
, 3 games to 2, in the sport's first
White Flag
encounter.
The Rules
: Classic two-team match-up.
The Match
: John Tronolone defeated Eamon Fitzpatrick, 3 - 2, in the first-ever
White Flag
Match.
*Eamon's captains career was not on the line
.
Captains Statistics
: Tronolone 5-8-0 / E. Fitzpatrick 0-1-0. There was an 11 year age difference between captains, the biggest gap in
EastCoastDodgeball
history. Twelve-year old Eamon also became the youngest leading general ever. This was Tronolone's record-breaking 13th time in the captains chair as well as his second straight victory.
Moments & Stars
: Chris Adams's busting up both elbows after fearlessly diving for a ball; Ryan Letsche celebrating after his elimination on young newbie Taylor Nesbitts .. a celebrating Letsche seconds later eliminated by Eamon Fitzpatrick to a standing ovation; John Tronolone getting the final kills in Games 1, 2, and 3; Bobby Vetrano receiving headshots from Dan Fitzpatrick and Diana DiBuccio; the DODGEBALL 150 "Previews!"
Attendance
: 23, comprised of 19 men and 4 women
New Players
: Taylor Nesbitt
Other Notes
: The original contest slated for DODGEBALL CXLIX pitted Derek Carty against John Tronolone. Carty however was unable to attend, informing "The Writer" of his absence a few hours before showtime. For the second consecutive week, Dan Spengeman provided music for the event.
________________________________________
________________________
Season 15 Finale
DODGEBALL 150
August 9, 2008
5pm Start Time
Whether you've played for four weeks, seven months, one year, or were there during those first days, EastCoastDodgeball has reached its next milestone extravaganza. Your participation, your undying heart, your endless about of time and sacrifice have allowed such a pinnacle to happen. This is what it's all about.
"The Battle of the Sexes" six-person collision, returning "MoneyMaker" Rimshot Contest, among other festivities are all slated for this soon-to-be classic thrilling summer spectacle. Check back midweek for the official preview of DODGEBALL 150.
body_html:
TRONOLONE against Last-Minute Substitute E. FITZPATRICK!
Tronolone's Captains Career in Jeopardy!

In the absence of originally scheduled participant Derek Carty, one brave upstart agreed to take his place ...

The most losing, unlucky team general of all-time put his generalship on the line against the youngest, brightest star of the modern era - and both were eager to take advantage of the opportunity presented to them.

Flash Results by Game
Tronolone: 1, 2, 3
Fitzpatrick: 4, 5

Those in attendance for this 149th surely went home with a glowing smile, and not because the cocky Tronolone kept his captains career out of the grave. A plethora of memorable, laughable moments coupled with pavement-diving catches and wicked dodging displays allowed all 23 participants to thoroughly enjoy the three hours given on this Saturday night. Plus, the enthusiasm and heart of the sport's now-youngest leading captain couldn't disappoint.

On the doorstep of the summer thriller, DODGEBALL 150, self-proclaimed "Creation" John Tronolone narrowly defeated youthful sensation Eamon Fitzpatrick, 3 games to 2, in the sport's first White Flag encounter.

The Rules: Classic two-team match-up.
The Match: John Tronolone defeated Eamon Fitzpatrick, 3 - 2, in the first-ever White Flag Match. *Eamon's captains career was not on the line.
Captains Statistics: Tronolone 5-8-0 / E. Fitzpatrick 0-1-0. There was an 11 year age difference between captains, the biggest gap in EastCoastDodgeball history. Twelve-year old Eamon also became the youngest leading general ever. This was Tronolone's record-breaking 13th time in the captains chair as well as his second straight victory.
Moments & Stars: Chris Adams's busting up both elbows after fearlessly diving for a ball; Ryan Letsche celebrating after his elimination on young newbie Taylor Nesbitts .. a celebrating Letsche seconds later eliminated by Eamon Fitzpatrick to a standing ovation; John Tronolone getting the final kills in Games 1, 2, and 3; Bobby Vetrano receiving headshots from Dan Fitzpatrick and Diana DiBuccio; the DODGEBALL 150 "Previews!"
Attendance: 23, comprised of 19 men and 4 women
New Players: Taylor Nesbitt
Other Notes: The original contest slated for DODGEBALL CXLIX pitted Derek Carty against John Tronolone. Carty however was unable to attend, informing "The Writer" of his absence a few hours before showtime. For the second consecutive week, Dan Spengeman provided music for the event.

________________________________________________________________


Season 15 Finale
DODGEBALL 150
August 9, 2008
5pm Start Time


Whether you've played for four weeks, seven months, one year, or were there during those first days, EastCoastDodgeball has reached its next milestone extravaganza. Your participation, your undying heart, your endless about of time and sacrifice have allowed such a pinnacle to happen. This is what it's all about.

"The Battle of the Sexes" six-person collision, returning "MoneyMaker" Rimshot Contest, among other festivities are all slated for this soon-to-be classic thrilling summer spectacle. Check back midweek for the official preview of DODGEBALL 150.
